attributes.action: Ban the Donald Trump inflatable during Donald Trump's visit to the UK,
attributes.additional_details: This has been confirmed by myself by calling the London Evening Standard who have confirmed that Sadiq Khan has given the permission
attributes.background: The mayor of London has given permission to allow a giant inflatable effigy of Donald Trump to be flown over Westminster whilst Mr Trump visits the UK on a state visit.This is highly insensitive Sadiq Khan wouldn't like an effigy of Mohammed portrayed in a bad light and has overstepped his boundarie

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Mayor of London is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
